ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle caffeinated citrus-flavored soda (such as Mountain DewÂ®)
1 (0.13 ounce) package unsweetened lemon-lime flavored drink mix (such as KOOL-AIDÂ®)
des: "This recipe is sweet and a pretty green color. Perfect for Christmas time. I keep a pitcher of this in the refrigerator (tightly covered to keep carbonation) for a week or so for unexpected drop-ins during the holidays. Serve over ice."
ins: Mix citrus-flavored soda, Tom Collins mixer, pineapple juice, vodka, and lemon-lime flavored drink mix together in a large pitcher or punch bowl.
